verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Always remember, never forget,
never foget to say "Thankyou!"
Always remember, ,never forget,
always say "Thankyou!"

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thankyou for the food to eat,
for clothes to wear, shoes on our feet.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thankyou for health today
for strength to work and run and play.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thank you for a place to stay,
for warmth and comfort day by day.
